appDescription.message: Seçili metni Google Translate ile çevir

contextmenu_title.description: Title of the context menu that appears when a right click is done. Inside this parent item there are the target languages.

contextmenu_title2.description: Title of the context menu that appears when a right click is done and there's only one language available.

contextmenu_edit.description: Title of the item inside the 'Translate section into...' context menu which is used to go to the options page.

options_welcome.description: Title of the options page which welcomes users

options_introduction.message: Lütfen, "çevir" menüsünde görüntülenmesini istediğiniz dilleri seçin.
options_introduction.description: Introduction paragraph in the options page preceding the language list.

options_languageselectheader.description: Header of the selected languages list.

options_otheroptionsheader.description: Subheader in the options page before the options to choose where should the translation be shown..

options_tabsoption_1.message: Her çeviri için yeni bir sekmede Google Translate'i açın.
options_tabsoption_1.description: Option which defines where should the translations be shown (in this case, each translation will be opened in a new tab).

options_tabsoption_2.message: Tek bir sekmede Google Translate'i açın ve birden fazla sekme açmak yerine en yeni çeviriyi değiştirin.
options_tabsoption_2.description: Option which defines where should the translations be shown (in this case, each translation will be opened in the same tab used for the previous translation, or will open a new tab if there aren't any translation tabs open).

options_savebutton.description: Save button in the settings page

options_addlanguage_addbutton.description: 'Add' button in the footer of the languages list which is used to show a dialog with a list of potential languages to add. In the dialog, this message is also shown inside a button which is used to confirm the action.

options_language_label.description: Label for the language selector in the 'Add language' dialog

options_credits.description: Message for the link to the credits dialog, and also the title for the credits dialog, which shows a list of open source projects used inside the extension and a list of translators/contributors.

options_credits_homepage.description: Text shown for links to go to each homepage of open source projects in the credits. NOTE: put in in lowercase letters

options_credits_by.description: Fragment of the author statement in an item of the credits. NOTE: put in in lowercase letters. EXAMPLE: '{{options_credits_by}} Adrià Vilanova Martínez'

options_ok.description: OK button in informative dialogs, which is used to close them (no action is done when pressing these buttons)

options_cancel.description: Cancel button in the dialogs, to reject an action.

notification_install_title.message: 'Seçili Metni Çevir' seçeneğini yüklediğiniz için teşekkür ederiz

notification_install_message.message: Uzantıyı yapılandırmak için bu bildirimi tıklayın.

notification_upgradedtostorage_message.message: Artık ayarlarınız tüm cihazlarınız üzerinde senkronize olacak! Tek kötü tarafi, uzantıyı yeniden yüklemeniz gerekmesi. :-( Yüklemek için bu bildirimi tıklayın.

notification_reorder_message.message: Şimdi dillerin içerik menüsünde görünmesini istediğiniz sırayı yapılandırabilirsiniz.
